text: Hi, my code throws an error when I try to run it.
I can help! What language is your code in, and what is the error message?
It’s in Python. The error says: IndexError: list index out of range.
Can you share the code that produces this error?
Thank you. It looks like you’re accessing an element that may not exist. Consider checking the length of the list before accessing an index.
Got it. I’ll add a check.
Let me know if that resolves the issue!
It works now. Thanks for your help!
